title: Appointment
description: The object used for the borrower to request an appointment

appointmentId.description: The unique identifier for the appointment

locationId.description: The unique identifier for the branch/office where the appointment will occur

borrowerId.description: The unique identifier for borrower requesting an appointment

borrowerPhoneNumber.description: The borrower's contact number for this appointment

requestedDate.description: The date of the borrower's requested appointment

requestedTime.description: The time of the borrower's requested appointment
